import React from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { createStructuredSelector } from 'reselect' import { selectCartItems, selectCartTotal } from '../../redux/cart/cartSelectors' import './checkoutStyle.scss' const CheckoutComponent = ({cartItems, total}) => { return (
Product
Description
Quantity
Price
Remove
{ cartItems.map(cartItem => cartItem.name ) }
TOTAL: ${total}
) } const mapStateToProps = createStructuredSelector({ cartItems: selectCartItems, total: selectCartTotal }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(CheckoutComponent)
